abstract: Warren E. Buffett has long been revered as America’s top investor. But as his company prepares for its latest annual meeting, he is sure to be questioned about his leadership.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett has long been revered as America’s top investor. But as his company prepares for its latest annual meeting, he is sure to be questioned about his leadership.
lead_paragraph: “He picked the chorus line but didn’t attempt to dance.”

headline.main: Warren Buffett, the Delegator in Chief
